title: What is the significance of 5 in numerology? - Quora

response.answer_text: "Five" is ​​the number of pentagram, a five-pointed occult magic star, that is spread in all directions in search of perfection. The number 5 is the most dynamic and energetic of all the single-digit numbers. It is unpredictable, always in motion and constantly in need of change. People of Number 5 are very interesting and besides, they are usually friendly to the others and tolerant to different ideas and opinions. However, their showy appearance or sarcastic remarks at times may seem unpleasant for those who like to follow strict rules. With their insatiable curiosity, people of Number 5 love to chat, share gossip, news, new trends.

As per Pythagoras - great father of Numerology, Number 5 is a number for enjoyments, freedom and adventure. It also brings our hidden desires which we have been missing in our lives to create a balance. It restores the confidence and makes you watch life from a different perspective. Even though the number is adventurous, it also has a vision and a motive which makes one going into the right direction. The positive side represents expression, versatility, mental curiosity, change, travel and good management of affairs. The negative side manifests itself as changeability, indecision, quickness to the point of thoughtlessness ad irresponsibility.
